author: barrettj
msg: Fix for changed commited to 649213.  Those changes break ?xsd since the schemaList has been released.
Added config property control to whether the AxisService resources will be released.  Default is that they will not be released.
Added tests to verify the default and enabled behavior.

author: dkulp
msg: Add final information about CXF graduating

author: chirino
msg: Bad logic was not propagating the transport exception up.

author: spepping
msg: An implementation of a positive integer property maker. It implements
convertProperty, which is the correct method to implement if one wants
to add to the make process. This fixes bug 44619.

author: hboutemy
msg: [MSITE-314] use ${project.build.sourceEncoding} as default value for "inputEncoding" parameter
